Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

QuadrupoleTrapAnalysis.cxx
1 #include "KSReadFileROOT.h"
2 
3 #include <limits>
4 using std::numeric_limits;
5 
6 using namespace Kassiopeia;
7 
8 int main()
9 {
10  katrin::KMessageTable::GetInstance().SetTerminalVerbosity( eDebug );
11  katrin::KMessageTable::GetInstance().SetLogVerbosity( eDebug );
12 
13  KRootFile* tRootFile = KRootFile::CreateOutputRootFile( "QuadrupoleTrapSimulation.root" );
14 
15  KSReadFileROOT tReader;
16  tReader.OpenFile( tRootFile );
17 
18  KSReadRunROOT& tRunReader = tReader.GetRun();
19  KSReadEventROOT& tEventReader = tReader.GetEvent();
20  KSReadTrackROOT& tTrackReader = tReader.GetTrack();
21  KSReadStepROOT& tStepReader= tReader.GetStep();
22 
23 // KSReadObjectROOT& tWorld = tStepReader.Get( "component_step_world" );
24 // KSDouble& tLength = tWorld.Get< KSDouble >( "time" );
25 
26  KSReadObjectROOT& tCell = tStepReader.GetObject( "component_step_cell" );
27  KSDouble& tMoment = tCell.Get< KSDouble >( "orbital_magnetic_moment" );
28  KSDouble tMinMoment;
29  KSDouble tMaxMoment;
30  double tDeviation;
31 
32  for( tRunReader = 0; tRunReader <= tRunReader.GetLastRunIndex(); tRunReader++ )
33  {
34  for( tEventReader = tRunReader.GetFirstEventIndex(); tEventReader <= tRunReader.GetLastEventIndex(); tEventReader++ )
35  {
36  for( tTrackReader = tEventReader.GetFirstTrackIndex(); tTrackReader <= tEventReader.GetLastTrackIndex(); tTrackReader++ )
37  {
38  tMinMoment = numeric_limits< double >::max();
39  tMaxMoment = numeric_limits< double >::min();
40  for( tStepReader = tTrackReader.GetFirstStepIndex(); tStepReader <= tTrackReader.GetLastStepIndex(); tStepReader++ )
41  {
42  if( tCell.Valid() )
43  {
44  if( tMoment.Value() > tMaxMoment.Value() )
45  {
46  tMaxMoment = tMoment;
47  }
48 
49  if( tMoment.Value() < tMinMoment.Value() )
50  {
51  tMinMoment = tMoment;
52  }
53  }
54  }
55 
56  tDeviation = 2.0 * ((tMaxMoment.Value() - tMinMoment.Value()) / (tMaxMoment.Value() + tMinMoment.Value()));
57 
58  cout << "extrema for track <" << tDeviation << ">" << endl;
59  }
60  }
61  }
62 
63 
64  tReader.CloseFile();
65 
66  delete tRootFile;
67 
68  return 0;
69 }
